performance_metrics.name: Yield Rate (%)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of dough mass converted into finished bread loaves. Lower values indicate higher waste and inefficiency. Should be maintained through consistent ingredient ratios and process control.

performance_metrics.name: Loaf Volume (cm³)
performance_metrics.description: Average volume of a finished bread loaf. Important for consistency and meeting customer specifications. Measured using a calibrated displacement method.

performance_metrics.name: Crumb Specific Volume (cm³/g)
performance_metrics.description: A measure of the open structure of the crumb. Higher values generally indicate a lighter, more desirable bread texture. Measured via standardized crumb testing (ASTM D864).

performance_metrics.name: Moisture Content (%)
performance_metrics.description: The water content of the finished bread. Crucial for shelf life and texture. Monitored via Karl Fischer titration.

performance_metrics.name: Overall Line Speed (Loaves/Hour)
performance_metrics.description: The speed at which the production line operates, considering throughput and equipment capacity. Dependent on loaf size and complexity.

performance_metrics.name: Dough Development Time (minutes)
performance_metrics.description: The time between initial dough mixing and dough development. Impacts gluten strength and final bread quality.

performance_metrics.name: Shelf Life (Days)
performance_metrics.description: The period during which the bread maintains acceptable quality. Primarily affected by moisture content, storage conditions, and formulation.

implementation_requirements.name: Dough Mixer
implementation_requirements.specifications: Spiral mixer with a capacity of 1000-1500 kg, stainless steel construction, variable speed control, dough temperature monitoring and control (±2°C), automated cleaning cycle.
implementation_requirements.description: Ensures homogenous dough mixing with precise temperature control.

implementation_requirements.name: Proofing Cabinet
implementation_requirements.specifications: Temperature control: 38-43°C, Humidity control: 70-80%, Capacity: 800-1200 kg dough, automated temperature and humidity regulation, continuous monitoring.
implementation_requirements.description: Controlled environment for optimal dough fermentation.

implementation_requirements.name: Shaping Machine
implementation_requirements.specifications: Automated shaping machine with multiple loaf molds (e.g., baguette, sandwich, round), output rate of 60-80 loaves/hour, stainless steel construction, integrated crumb vibration.
implementation_requirements.description: Consistent shaping for uniform loaf dimensions and structure.

implementation_requirements.name: Deck Oven
implementation_requirements.specifications: Temperature: 230-260°C, Humidity Control: 70-80%, Output: 600-800 loaves/hour, Zone Heating, Consistent Baking Profile
implementation_requirements.description: High-temperature baking for crust development and volume expansion.

implementation_requirements.name: Cooling Conveyor
implementation_requirements.specifications: Temperature controlled to 15-20°C, Stainless Steel, Vibration Dampening Features
implementation_requirements.description: Controlled cooling to prevent staling and maintain crumb structure.

implementation_requirements.name: Packaging System
implementation_requirements.specifications: Automated bagging system with nitrogen flushing, temperature controlled,  Label printing integration.
implementation_requirements.description: Protects bread from moisture and contaminants, extending shelf life.
